Multiple, distinct IP addresses observed.Action: Monitor Zeek dns.log. Group DNS queries by domain name. For each domain, track the set of resolved IP addresses over time. Identify domains resolving to a large number of distinct IPs or having consistently low TTL values (e.g., < 300 seconds). Use correlation analysis to identify domains with a high number of associated IPs relative to typical domains, or time series analysis to detect the rapid cycling of IPs.
